p: Studies were considered if they met the following inclusion criteria: (1) pre-clinical (in vitro and in vivo studies) and clinical studies, (2) study model of HA as the primary disorder, (3) full-text available and (4) articles published in English. The exclusion criteria included: (1) studies with ataxia as the secondary symptom, (2) studies targeting non-motor symptoms, (3) studies using chemicals to induce ataxia, (4) review articles, (5) conference abstracts or proceedings, (6) full-text not available and (7) articles published in another language other than English.
